item.title: Crypto: the Three Endgames
item.description: I’ve found recently this tweet: https://twitter.com/Tr0llyTr0llFace/status/1389548874688307203 I thought the three scenarios were interesting, so I thought to do a bit of a thought experiment and see when they happen.
